step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Try to keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nicely done. Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together as you roll them back and down.
Great job completing the first rep! Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back.
Second rep starting well. Keep the motion smooth and controlled.
Excellent! You're really getting the hang of squeezing those shoulder blades.
Fantastic finish! You completed both reps with good form and controlled movement.

exercise_summary: Great job with your shoulder rolls! You're doing a good job of moving your shoulders in a circular motion and squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to breathe deeply with each movement to maximize the benefits.
